level.heading: Rules.
level.text: The Mayor, pursuant to subchapter I of Chapter 5 of Title 2 shall issue rules to implement the provisions of this subchapter.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 13-276
level.text: For D.C. Law 13-276, see notes following ยง 7-851.

level.heading: Delegation of Authority
level.text: Delegation of Authority Pursuant to DC Law 13-276, the "Newborn Hearing Screening Act of 2000", see Mayor's Order 2002-12, February 1, 2002 (49 DCR 929).
